blog.name: ao3feed-theforceawakens
blog.title: AO3Feed-The Force Awakens
blog.description: Fan fiction for Star Wars: The Force Awakens

title: A Spark of Hope
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TTt7d3

by StarWarsGirl26

After the battle of Crait, Rey and Kylo have still experience the connection through the force, making them wonder if snoke really was the one to create it in the first place. Rey and Kylo both feel a profound connection to one another and the grow closer, but being on opposite sides of a war is dangerous, one wrong move on either side and everything could be ruined. Could their love destroy the galaxy like Anakin and Padmé’s did? Or could it save it.

Words: 1940, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars, Reylo - Fandom
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey, Kylo Ren, Ben Solo, Finn, Rose, Poe Dameron, Kaydel Connix, Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker, Anakin Skywalker, Chewbacca, Padmé Amidala, Maz Kanata, Lando Calrissian, Hux, Knights of Ren
  • Relationships: Rey|Kylo, Finn|Rose, Poe|Kaydel


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TTt7d3

summary: and my heart goes boom, boom, boom
title: and my heart goes boom, boom, boom
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2WgAPL5

by hi_raeth

When Ben first decided to start a rival fireworks shop near his father’s place at the young age of eighteen, he didn’t really have much of a plan aside from “piss Dad off”.

But he can’t exactly say that to the beautiful girl behind the counter now, can he?

(The fireworks shop AU no one asked for, inspired by this post.

blog.name: admiralashla
blog.title: Stuck On Myrkr
blog.description:
“He risked a glance at the aft-vision display. The other fighter was coming up fast, with no more than a minute or two separating the two ships. Obviously, the pilot had far more experience with the craft than Luke had. That, or else such a fierce determination to recapture Luke that it completely overrode normal commonsense caution.

Either way, it meant Mara Jade.”

My mere mortals, this blog is, shall we say, an experiment about the old star wars eu.

My most beloved character: Mara Jade. StuckOnMyrkr: insta.

summary: “Victims run off and hide. Prey runs off and hides. But I'm not a victim. And I'm not prey. I'm the Emperor's Hand. I am the...
body:
“Victims run off and hide. Prey runs off and hides. But I’m not a victim. And I’m not prey. I’m the Emperor’s Hand. I am the ultimate predator. And it’s time for Dequc and Black Nebula to die.”

―Mara Jade during her hunt for Dequc. Mara Jade: By the Emperor’s Hand.

reblog.comment:
“Victims run off and hide. Prey runs off and hides. But I’m not a victim. And I’m not prey. I’m the Emperor’s Hand. I am the ultimate predator. And it’s time for Dequc and Black Nebula to die.”

―Mara Jade during her hunt for Dequc. Mara Jade: By the Emperor’s Hand.

trail.content_raw:
“Victims run off and hide. Prey runs off and hides. But I’m not a victim. And I’m not prey. I’m the Emperor’s Hand. I am the ultimate predator. And it’s time for Dequc and Black Nebula to die.”

―Mara Jade during her hunt for Dequc. Mara Jade: By the Emperor’s Hand.

“Victims run off and hide. Prey runs off and hides. But I’m not a victim. And I’m not prey. I’m the Emperor’s Hand. I am the ultimate predator. And it’s time for Dequc and Black Nebula to die.”

―Mara Jade during her hunt for Dequc. Mara Jade: By the Emperor’s Hand.

summary:
Official Star Wars Kylo Ren TFA Spotify List: This Means War
Yes, I said "official"
Why did LucasFilm choose this song?
Hide my...
body:
Official Star Wars Kylo Ren TFA Spotify List: This Means War

Yes, I said “official”

Why did LucasFilm choose this song?

This Means War 🦇☠🦇

Hide my face again, harbor in the shadows

Feel this weight of sin hammering away

Die, with the guilt of a thousand AWOL soldiers

Die, watch the scythe usher me astray

I can’t go on this way

Not as I am today

The ugly side of me is strong

Take aim, a loaded gun.

Pull back on all who run.

A coward’s truth inside the wrong.

(Hiding his face, hiding in the shadows, Kylo feels the weight of sin. The lyrics descibe shooting those who run, but when FN-2187 (Finn) runs, and eventually goes AWOL, he mysteriously doesn’t kill him. Also, the “scythe” line reminds me of his murder of Lor San Tekka.)

This means war

This means war

This means war

***************

Lash your tongue of bane

Carry me to nowhere

Mental holocaust

Battle never ends

Lie! Mask the pain

Of a child who’s forsaken

Lie! To myself

Praise the new regime

(The mental turmoil of “a child whose forsaken”, who wears a mask to hide his pain and emotions, and lies to himself, praising the “new regime”: The First Order.)

I left me long ago

Reasons you’ll never know

No one to miss me when I’m gone

With no more words to say

No argument to stay.

Another post I don’t belong

(When his father calls him “Ben” and offers to bring him home, Kylo is born between staying or leaving, unsure of where he belongs. Interesting “I left me long ago, reasons you’ll never know”: Han knows that Snoke was involved in Ben’s turn to the Dark Side, but he doesn’t know of Luke Skywalker’s involvement.)

This means war

This means war

This means war

This means war

This means war

**************

No home to call my own

No finding someone new

No one to break the fall

No one to see me through

No name to carry on

No promise for today

No one to hear the call

No tattered flag to raise

(That is of course, until he meets Rey.)

Walk the razor’s edge

Cut into the madness

Question all you trust

Buy into the fear

I see the man ripping at my soul now

I, I know the man

I know him all too well

(Snoke is the “man” ripping at Kylo’s soul, he knows him all too well, he’s been in Kylo’s head, twisting his thoughts, putting fear and mistrust in his mind.)

There’s nothing here for free

Lost who I want to be

My serpent blood can strike so cold

On any given day

I’ll take it all away

Another thought I can’t control

(“Serpent blood”, “murderous snake!” But if you read between the lines, he lost who he wants to be. He hates himself for being what he is.)

This means war

This means war

This means war

This means war

***********

In a nutshell, the song was written about a soilder at war with himself, at war with the guilt for the lives he’s taken. Kind of perfect for Kylo Ren, wouldn’t you say?

reblog.comment:
Official Star Wars Kylo Ren TFA Spotify List: This Means War

Yes, I said “official”

Why did LucasFilm choose this song?

This Means War 🦇☠🦇

Hide my face again, harbor in the shadows

Feel this weight of sin hammering away

Die, with the guilt of a thousand AWOL soldiers

Die, watch the scythe usher me astray

I can’t go on this way

Not as I am today

The ugly side of me is strong

Take aim, a loaded gun.

Pull back on all who run.

A coward’s truth inside the wrong.

(Hiding his face, hiding in the shadows, Kylo feels the weight of sin. The lyrics descibe shooting those who run, but when FN-2187 (Finn) runs, and eventually goes AWOL, he mysteriously doesn’t kill him. Also, the “scythe” line reminds me of his murder of Lor San Tekka.)

This means war

This means war

This means war

***************

Lash your tongue of bane

Carry me to nowhere

Mental holocaust

Battle never ends

Lie! Mask the pain

Of a child who’s forsaken

Lie! To myself

Praise the new regime

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

summary: STAR WARS: VADER - DARK VISIONS #5 (OF 5) DENNIS “HOPELESS” HALLUM (W) • GERALDO BORGES (A) COVER BY GREG SMALLWOOD Variant...
caption:
STAR WARS: VADER - DARK VISIONS #5 (OF 5)

DENNIS “HOPELESS” HALLUM (W) • GERALDO BORGES (A)
COVER BY GREG SMALLWOOD
Variant Cover by ACO
NIGHTMARE ON THE OUTER RIM!
• A backwater jungle planet teeming with poisonous plants.
• The search for a device that can track the REBELS.
• A psychedelic nightmare triggered by the local flora — with a terror known as DARTH VADER!
32 PGS./Rated T …$3.99
Star Wars © Lucasfilm Ltd. & TM. All rights reserved. Used under authorization. Text and illustrations for Star Wars are © 2019 Lucasfilm Ltd.

summary: lost and found and lost yet again
title: lost and found and lost yet again
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TV7s3B

by outruntheavalanche

It was a colossal mistake, he can see that now. Written for the “100 words of kissing and regrets” prompt, but with 0% kissing and 100% regrets.

Words: 194, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 5 of ffa drabbles

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Anakin Skywalker, Ahsoka Tano, Obi-Wan Kenobi (mentioned)
  • Relationships: Obi-Wan Kenobi/Anakin Skywalker (mentioned), Anakin Skywalker & Ahsoka Tano
  • Additional Tags: Regret, Awkwardness, Human Disaster Anakin Skywalker, Anakin Skywalker Needs a Hug, Drabble


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TV7s3B

blog.name: totallycorrectstarwarsquotes
blog.title: Totallycorrectstarwarsquotes
blog.description: | These are 110% real | I’m Star Wars Trash | Lots of Kylux | Talk to me about our disaster space gays | Asks and submissions are always open |

summary:
Rey (to Finn and Poe): You guys are idiots, did you know that?
Finn: In our defence, we did actually know that.
body:
